title: The ransomware problem won't get better until we change one thing
description: Targets of ransomware rarely publicly acknowledge attacks. More openness would help everyone.

title: A Microsoft user raged against Outlook. Microsoft lovers fought back
description: When you think Microsoft's email service is terrible, maybe you forget that it could be worse.

title: I just spent a week with a robot cat and my life will never be the same
description: The metaCat is AI-powered. It's the perfect companion. It's lifelike. But what else is it?
